name: Construction Runner
description:
This is the first game I made using Unreal Engine and also the first game I have ever released to the public.
This is just a simple Jump ’n’ Run game where you are running through a construction site and have do dodge the obstacles coming towards you and based on the time you survived you get awarded points.
It currently there are not a lot of features in the game, hence the early access status; more stuff will be added in the future.

If you are wondering about the high system requirements down below those are just the settings that I could test since I dont have more hardware to my disposal.
This game does require a quite powerful PC because I havent gone into optimization so far but that will be added in the future (WIP).
